trans-unit.source: The TYPO3 version you're using is outdated. You should update to a supported version, e.g. %s
The TYPO3 version is up to date.
No Release Information for this version available. This should not happen on a production system. Maybe on a development release?
Files and folders in location %1$s can be listed. Please set "Options -Indexes" in your .htaccess file or put empty index.html file inside those folder(s).

Some files with sensitive information can be downloaded. Files treated as sensitive are: %1$s, which are placed in root folder of website and in first level of subfolders.

Below there is part of the sensitive files that can be downloaded from your website:
%2$s

Remove them or please consider some .htaccess settings to prevent their downloading.

Example of .htaccess protection:
<FilesMatch "\.(sql|sql.gz)$">
Order Allow,Deny
Deny from all
</FilesMatch>
